# cancel | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Foundation ](/documentation/corefoundation)

- [ CFRunLoopSourceContext ](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext)

- [ cancel ](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/cancel)

- [ CFRunLoopSourceContext ](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext)

-  cancel 

Instance Property# cancel

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
var cancel: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, CFRunLoop?, CFRunLoopMode?) -> Void)!
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/cancel#parameters)

`info`The `info` member of the [`CFRunLoopSourceContext`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext) structure that was used when creating the run loop source.

`rl`The run loop from which the run loop source is being removed.

`mode`The run loop mode from which the run loop source is being removed.

## [Discussion](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/cancel#discussion)

A cancel callback for the run loop source. This callback is called when the source is removed from a run loop mode. Can be `NULL`.

## [See Also](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/cancel#see-also)

### [Callbacks](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/cancel#Callbacks)

Can be `NULL`.[`var hash: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> CFHashCode)!`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/hash)A hash calculation callback for your program-defined `info` pointer. Can be `NULL`.[`var perform: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> Void)!`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/perform)A perform callback for the run loop source. This callback is called when the source has fired.[`var schedule: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, CFRunLoop?, CFRunLoopMode?) -> Void)!`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopsourcecontext/schedule)A scheduling callback for the run loop source. This callback is called when the source is added to a run loop mode. Can be `NULL`.
